videos.description: Xavier Johnson picks up the UNC turnover and gets a clear path to the basket for the easy dunk for Pittsburgh.

tracking.trackingName: NCB_One-Play (Pitt's Johnson gets steal, then slams it home) 2019/01/05

videos.headline: Pitt's Johnson gets steal, then slams it home

videos.description: Luke Maye rejects Terrell Brown at the rim, then Garrison Brooks scores in the post on the other end for North Carolina.

tracking.trackingName: NCB_One-Play (Maye's denial sets up UNC's basket) 2019/01/05

videos.headline: Maye's denial sets up UNC's basket

videos.description: Nassir Little races back on defense and swats Jared Wilson-Frame's shot out of bounds with his left hand.

tracking.trackingName: NCB_One-Play (Little skies for big block for UNC) 2019/01/05

videos.headline: Little skies for big block for UNC
